ComicInfo.Summary:
Emma finally has a moment to breathe (or at least she thinks she does) as all seems to be back to normal in her District Attorney's office. Just when she thought that she could have a good night's sleep, a new group of super villains start making their presence known in San Francisco. Forced into action once again, "The Endgame" plays the Muse to her already stretched limits. Getting badly beaten, her dual lives are in more conflict than ever as her parents are stopping by for the weekend...
with covers by (A) Roger Cruz, (B) Talent Caldwell and (C) Craig Rousseau
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 09:22:50. [CVDB133022]
ComicInfo.Inker: Eddie Wagner, Oclair Albert, Roger Cruz
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Craig Rousseau, Roger Cruz, Talent Caldwell
